448690.name: Lionessy Story
448690.description:
«Lionessy story» is a visual novel that tells a story of a lion cub living out his carefree days in a lion pride reigning over the great African savannah. But life in the wilderness is never easy, and after a terrible tragedy yanks him out of his pampered lifestyle, the young cub has to face the dangers of the real world where anything goes and even “the king of beasts” is a fair game.

Key features:
- A unique art style that endows characters with human emotions while staying away from outright anthropomorphism;
- Realistic depiction of lions’ lifestyle in their natural habitat;
- Actual facts and information about lions
